properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Large recently created car park. Quite flat and very close to the beach and town. Cars and motorhomes allowed. no services

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.25)
properties.description: I have a Ducato as L2H1. No fourwheel drive. A window bus. People pay attention to their streets here. This is a wellmaintained gravel road. If its wet I probably wont come up here. But today it was dry and it was worth driving up carefully in first gear. With a little momentum it would have gone up faster but I pay attention to my chassis.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Parking spaces to go down to the beach. Parking possible for motorhomes.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: Along the road small gravel car park of a chapel in the middle of the vineyards 5 minutes from the village. Stayed one night without a hitch.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)
properties.description: Place for a short stop or overnight. A wine tasting across the road.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Small path along the sea where there are some sites not to block the way to spend the night. Height limited to 2 m from the branches. Small coves nearby. Thank you for preserving the cleanliness of the place.WARNING  no overnight only for the day.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: church of our Lady of the rosary spotLovely tranquil spot next to a church and cemetery.only down side can be the hunters shooting in the background which didnt bothered us.in summer park directly at the right on the gravel and you have shade in the morning

properties.name: Free motorhome area (3.4)
properties.description: Campers are already spending the night here.  It is next to the road so you shouldnt expect peace and quiet.Free electricity access possible from one point 12 1 plugs available

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: A pitch with an incredible view. The parking space itself is in a curve of a gravel road. But this is almost never or not at all used you need good nerves to drive up here. But with the T5 2WD it wasnt a problem. View of the sea and the valley. Not recommended with a larger vehicle than a van except 4WD

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Parking on the beach. Entry limited to 2m10. Perfect for van or 4x4. flat terrain. the beach is pebble but 1m from the shore the bottom becomes sandy. View of the harbor and the sea. No services.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Free parking near Dalmatian house Poluta Drae

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.61)
properties.description: Free parking spot with lovely view of the new bridge. Swimming is possible a few hundred metres up the road. We stayed for one night and was quiet and peaceful. There is an outdoor shower just up the road but I think you have to pay. There were a few other campers there and felt very safe. About 8 spaces available

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.64)
properties.description: Ideal for a stopover for a night large car park with different spaces car truck bus toilets open 247 possible to refill water tap under the outdoor sinks picnic tables etc roadside busy so do not come if you are looking for peace.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.83)
properties.description: Nice parking lot perfect for transit to Dubrovnik and beyond. Location directly on a road above Komarna. Relatively quiet at night. Super nice view of the Peljeski Bridge. Kiosk with coffee cold drinks seating etc. is open during the day. No sign prohibiting overnight stays.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.29)
properties.description: Beautiful place with a small beach. After 200 m there is another small beach. we stayed overnight.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.9)
properties.description: Just a basketball court located at the bottom of a small fishing port. The no parking signs only concern the last spaces before the pitch according to locals. We spent two nights there with no problems. The port in question is not too busy with tourists and above all the Stijena restaurant is simply the best I have ever visited in Croatia in my life. See TripAdvisor reviews. In addition excursions to Miljet National Park are offered.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.6)
properties.description: Small spot in the middle of the bush completely isolated. Accessible only by van or 4x4. Last stony and narrow portion. 50m away magnificent view over the bay of Neum. 1 single location flat at the end of the path. Most total calm.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.56)
properties.description: Small place by the road with a beautiful view of the sea Access narrow street and tight bend but we can turn back. No service but super resting the Vitaceae with fresh fish grilled over a wood fire and oyster soup to fall 10 min walk. Some cars pass but relatively quiet. Stayed one night without problem.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)
properties.description: Parking with trees near the beach. We stayed during night without any problem. We payed about 20kn.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.75)
properties.description: Large asphalted parking space on churchcementary site. Very queit just a few cars passing nearby also we saw a police car passing by but they didint stopped or say anything so we figured were allowed to be here. Easy access to all kind of campers. Bad internet connection  Spent a great night and afternoon here without any problems please keep it clean and calm so it wont be a prohibition sign here

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.89)
properties.description: Rest area Winery Rizman

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Nice place for the night quiet and safe but very windy

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice quiet parking space ideal for one night

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.62)
properties.description: safe quiet beautiful view of the city

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.12)
properties.description: A the very end of the road just before tunel theres small marina. parking on the side of the road which is dead end after the tunnel so not a lot of traffic passing by. There are night visitors especially during weekends but they stay in car come and go. in the morning other few cars are approaching the marina but we hadnt any problem at all. sea is accessible by stoney beach

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.71)
properties.description: Parking near the coast in Neum

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Large pitch for two camper vans just at the center of the Dingac vineyards looks like a parking for the vineyard staff. Easy access just by the very quiet road so peaceful amazing views. There was no traffic at the night at the morning some friendly bikers and joggers past by . We spend a pleasant night here at the beginning of September although no shade here so at the midsummer be prepared for early morning.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.4)
properties.description: Parking at the bypass. no service

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Perfect spot on top of a vineyard hill with beautiful view little bit bumpy country road at the end stayed for 1 night

properties.name: Parking MH without service (3)
properties.description: Parking lot below the bus station with low rates for short and longterm parking of motorhomes. Subject to a charge from May to October otherwise free of charge. 10 minute walk to the beach restaurants and supermarket in the area. Unfortunately a bit trashy and uncomfortable and the church bell rings at very protestant times but good location safe and nice view. Attention Payment only possible with coins in local currency.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.13)
properties.description: Payable in high season free from 01.10. Places on the lawn under trees. Great location with lots of garbage cans. Grocery store is right above you. Beautiful view.

properties.name: Extra services (4.81)
properties.description: Drinking water under the shop on the wall.Aslo nice roofed picnic area and many benches by the bulla pool.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.44)
properties.description: The grounds of the campsite are located directly on the narrow pebble beach. Its pretty nice and clean. Otherwise the place is very average. The sanitary facilities are getting old and average clean. The staff a bit bored and especially in the bar at the entrance we had the feeling that we shouldnt order anything could do some work. Not worth the price we paid for one night.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: New fuel station with tap for water filling

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Water tap right next to the shed to buy park tickets

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.25)
properties.description: Marvelous place between the sea and the river.Abandoned kitesurfers camping.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Parking spot for Pirate bay port des pirates. Locals and fishermen during the day. Entry road is cemented were the road is steep. Road is small but ok for a T56 van. No beach but rocky spots to rest on and nice snorkeling in clear waters.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Nice place overlooking the bay. Located on a kind of closed water bunker. Nice place to cook and to spend the night but nothing else to do. In the distance you can see the defensive wall between Ston and Mali Ston. Only drawback you can hear the road that runs across the bay. Occasionally the pump in the water bunker will kick on not loudly. If you are coming from Mali Ston take the exit on the right after the exit to Luka. After about 2 km on the country road you come to the cape. Is visible on Google maps satellite.

properties.name: Extra services (3.33)
properties.description: There is a water tap 10 meters from the entrance at the hedge. no hose available. For free.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Parking without prohibition signs. several places available. large motorhome possible without problem. we spent the night there without problem but out of season. very calm.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)
properties.description: The square is at the end of a narrow street near the village of Mali Ston. The fortress wall can be visited in the village. Locals sometimes pass here to get to their gardens. Otherwise the place is very quiet here. Next to this place is a power house which makes a slight humming noise in the evening. The street is a bit narrow in parts but still manageable for a Bulli.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking just after the Bosnian border before the bridge a few spaces possible for all vehicles oyster farm fishing swimming rather nice view for information it was customs who indicated this parking to me

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.33)
properties.description: Free place by the road few places not far away beautiful beach with turquoise water and sand.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Big gravel parking spot on the edge of the road. Sloping and the gravel is a bit looserough. No signal. Lovely views and beautiful swimming cove at the end of the road. Also possibly to park there but it gets busy and is very sloping.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: If you want to go to Mjelt by the first ferry you can also park directly next to the ferry terminal. When I arrived there were countless commuter cars and visitors to the island. Nobody worried about the fact that I slept in the car. In the morning the toilets were open. Very good reception

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Drinking water point at the base of Sto Castle.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.36)
properties.description: Motorhome and car park convenient to visit Ston no services.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.69)
properties.description: Beautiful spot next to a dirt road with views across the sea. No services. If you continue down the track you can visit Odysseus Cave which is incredible and a good spot the swim. A few cars passing but generally very quiet with a nice sea breeze. Wouldnt recommend for bigger vehicles.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Small public car park in a culdesac in an industrial area just behind a car wash. We spent a quiet night here waiting for the ferry to Trpanj to depart.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Quiet parking at the edge of a stone path in the middle of olive trees. We absolutely do not obstruct the passage. Direct access to the cave of Odysseus 19 mins on foot. Access only for vans and vans. No bitumen.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: We met a friendly police who said its better to stay at Lidl then in town to not disturb anyone. He said its okay to stay here as long as you park in the corner and dont disturb anyone. We spent a good night and had a nice breakfast in the gasstation next door. There were barriers but they never closed

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.2)
properties.description: Spent a good night here but in the morning the bells woke up. Nearby Tommys grocery store and car service

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: After visiting the Odysseus Cavela cave here is a quiet place where you could spend the night

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Ideal place to start a hike and spend the night suitable for smaller campers.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Roadside parking spaces with mountain views and a fishing spot. Close to the road so a little noisy in the morning a few heavy goods vehicles in the evening. Troubleshoot for 1 night. Flat land max 4 vans. 3 minutes from the supermarket and 10 minutes from the ferry departure for the island of Mljet and a white sand beach and transparent water

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: In the middle of the woods and close to the sea. Ideal for small van the road is narrow path of pebbles.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Drinking water at the petrol station. Small pipe with slow flow but does the job.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.89)
properties.description: Small spot facing the sea at fishermen small harbour where they breed Oysters and mussels. No facilities. Very quiet place. Beautiful view quite windy and cold when we were there in late September. Space for one small camper. No trouble from any locals. Nice quiet spot

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: We just stopped for lunch during the day but it sounds like a great place to sleep. It is located at the bottom of a dirt road 50m below the road. At 3 p.m. we couldnt hear the noise of the cars at all. There are two beautiful and wide places in the shade. Access to the sea is via a small alley very cute. It takes 2 min on foot.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Nice place next to an abandoned building. Several accesses to the lake. Local residents are very nice there are also many apartments for rent nearby. Here figs are dried oils are made and boat trips on the lake are offered

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Water point behind the wall. Good flow

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.44)
properties.description: Small fishing port overlooking the bay feet in the water 4 seats maximum downhill a bit steep but tarred.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.43)
properties.description: Quiet but slightly sloping place on a gravel road surrounded by small mountains. Seen or heard no one from 4pm to 10am.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.29)
properties.description: At the edge of the water flat corner on the left immediately after the small bridge. Accessible in Van only. Pretty view on the expanse of water but quite exposed to the wind

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Small grassy parking free 5 minutes from the pier taking all right. Turn right after passing the church parking indicated. We stayed the night without any problem.

properties.name: Picnic area (4.75)
properties.description: Picknickarea with view to lakes. Toilet and little sale of local products.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: A nice public park no parking signs if i remember at the pier where the cars go around to start queueing. Quiet and pretty place.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Gravel parking spot on a cliff with a nice view. No shade however. We asked at the restaurant in the village below if it was OK to spend the night and they were fine as long as we dont bother anyone. Best for small to medium sized camper vans due to space and visibility.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: At the edge of a small road with little traffic right at the edge of the water swimming possible. We just stayed for a swim but the place seemed good for the night too

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Space for 2 vans great view

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.06)
properties.description: Parking between olive trees next to a cemetery. water tap and garbage cans at the cemetery.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.43)
properties.description: Nice quiet place the terrain is flat and a bit hidden so you cant see the car from the road. We stayed for 2 night and nobody bothered us. There is no light pollution so the night sky is amazing.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Narrow path suitable for smaller vehicles.  Level ground.  Surrounded by olive trees.  There was a little noise from the road.

properties.name: Picnic area (5)
properties.description: Picknickarea with toilet

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: On the gravel road that breaks into the other Park4night there are many small bays left and right along the road. The view is fabulous and there is a lot of shade. There are garbage cans here on the road every few meters and nobody comes here at night during the day it is a hiking trail and the beach is not 100 meters on foot. It is a gravel road that is not particularly bad I am sure it would also be easily accessible with a truck or a larger flat. I spent one night here.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.46)
properties.description: Beautiful easily accessible place at the end of a small street. Really gorgeous the path is gravelly and wide there are several ways to park. Very quiet and great nature Also good for bathing. We stayed there one night and felt comfortable. At the beginning of the road the road is still asphalted and you pass a garden nursery.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Beach car park. quiet out of season. sea view. good night lulled by the waves.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Rest area with some shade. Ideal to go to the beach and spend the night. Only two parking spaces.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.25)
properties.description: Below a wind turbine with a wonderful allround view. Perfect for sunset and sunrise. The place is huge gravel and flat as well as compacted. Good gravel road to get there no problem even with large motorhomes. The wind turbine sometimes makes noise and it can of course be windy. If that doesnt bother you spend a wonderful night with a wonderful view.Right next to the wind turbine there is a small bunker that is accessible.Attention Google Maps doesnt know the street yet Its best to enter VE Rudine and drive past the wind turbines to the last wind turbine at the end of the street.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking area in the little port of Lumbarda. Ok for one night in a van some people around during the evening. Every friday night in the little square there is the fishermens night with very good fish at low prices. A must

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.67)
properties.description: Small parking lot at the cemetery with toilet.

properties.name: Extra services (2.67)
properties.description: Beach showers and drinking water taps all the way from the seaside promenade to the harbor. Still in operation at the end of October.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Good spot for overnight stay. Close to road but quiet almost no cars at night. Good access for bigger Van. I guess with good comfort for 34 cars. We did not see any people there.

properties.name: Extra services (3.6)
properties.description: Gas station where u can refill water tank if asked staff. Garden tap in distance of 4meters from parking place need to have hose to get water from tap

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: A large gravel parking lot in the middle of the town. The beach is a 5 minute walk away.We stayed for 2 nights at the end of March and it was very quiet the locals didnt seem to bother us.But I dont know what it looks like in the high season.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Place in the countryside where we stayed 2 days without any problem. Its officially a separation zone to a hiking trail and a bay but in 2 days we only saw one person walking his dogs. There is no service nearby. To get there turn to the sign Uvala pre  planjak. The plus is the sublime bay at the end of the path Uvala pre however be careful the path is steep and sloping.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Peceful little parking lot in Lumbarda. We arived at 7 pm and until 10 am no cars or people passed by. If you park on the right side of the parking lot youll catch a shade in the morning. The parking lot is right next to the sea small boats were passing through the bay in the morning but it didnt wake us up. Good spot for cars vans and smaller campervans.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Nice spot in a very small village next to the church. you can stand on gravel  grass in front of the church or on asphalt next to the cemetery. public toilets are available. These were open when we were there.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Parking at the beginning of the slightly more difficult therefore less frequented route to the sveti ilija. Very quiet in the countryside in the low season early May completely alone. Road very narrow and passable only with small vans not larger than T3. No toilet no water but free. 15min run to Orebic.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.8)
properties.description: Super nice and quiet place. Finding it is a bit complicated because the streets are not on googel maps but feeling is ok too

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.9)
properties.description: Great place by the river. We stayed for two nights the only people there are local fishermen. To find Spot Drive south from Capljina there is a sign to the left across a small bridge for HUTOVO BLATO. Go right there next to the car dealership there is an entrance. Follow the road for 2 km.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking Ljubuki near museum and monastery

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.38)
properties.description: Small free wild parking at the end of the road with access to Kravica. Attention very little room difficult turnaround when it is full. Access for motorhome impossible. But van with 5.5m passes without problem. Surely quiet at night but sloping.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Really nice spot  isolated you need to drive for 10 min on a dirt road. Then paradise

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Service station with coffee stop toilets bottled gas and water eau potable  we needed only water . Staff friendly.  Water is free but a pleasure to buy chocolate

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Large flat parking lot that the police told us. Toilets in poor condition but fairly clean and functioning. Bars nearby and fairly busy road so noise until around 11pm and from 67am. Ok to spend the night.city WiFi available

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.46)
properties.description: Magnificent spot with the choice of lots of different locations between the two arms of the river. We parked behind the second bar on the right with our feet in the water. Only out of season because the bars that line the edges of the waterfalls are open in summer. In addition there are fireplaces and spaces for cooking over a wood fire. We stayed there for a week. No other service but we drank water from the river. in season possibility to stay in the parking lot of the 2nd bar by asking and consuming something toilets available and clean

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.88)
properties.description: Cascades de Kocusa The infrastructures bar brewery are no longer in service and abandoned. Nevertheless the place allows the parking of several motorhomes in a beautiful and particularly quiet environment.Parking near waterfals Koua near Vitina good restaurant nice place and people

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: I was able to recharge water for the camping car for free at this petrol station. Hose available. It is at stand number 6.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)
properties.description: Leaving the main road you can climb a path of chaille for a few meters and reach a beautiful flat. On foot one can climb to the top of a hill to admire the view.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.17)
properties.description: Church Holy Place Apparition of the Virgin Mary

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Small parking lot on the roadside to go swimming. Take the path to the left when you are facing the sea and at the bottom of the path go to the right a nice little cove we were alone.

properties.name: Extra services (4.83)
properties.description: Free drinking water right from spring. We filled our tank and bottles here. You need something to put water in.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.15)
properties.description: Great place to get off the highway. It is a side road.  There is no traffic car. The place is next to the football field.  easy safe quiet.  We stayed here for one night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Quiet parking space in the middle of a pleasant town with many supermarkets and restaurants. Recommended restaurant almost at the parking lot on the water. Sitting inside and out. Nice before or after visiting the Kravika waterfalls.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Quiet free parking lot right by the river next to a retirement home. Right next to the bridge over the river. Quiet and little traffic

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.1)
properties.description: Gravel parking next to the river no services about 1km from the town. Turning is right next to a small bridge.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: City parking on the road. The fee is 160 kuna for the whole day. Payment by application. During the day the city guard comes several times and checks the fees. The beach is very small but charming. Nearby there is a concrete promenade by the sea that leads to Drvenik. We stayed 1 night with no problems.

properties.name: Extra services (4.75)
properties.description: Gas station with free showers and toilets. water refill possible. Free WiFi. Friendly staff. I gave a tip for the showers and will do that if possible.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Free parking in the shade of the trees. Good amount of space for cars and motorhomes  parked on weekdays at end of season was quiet and on the beach front. Nice swimming area with restaurants and bars. I did not spend the night. ATM here. High season 3 per hour.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Very remote beautiful spot on a kind of forest road. You stand in the middle of nature next to a small cross and have a spectacular view of the surrounding mountains. You feel a bit like being in Africa and Mongolia at the same time. In the morning a farmer and his kids came by to collect wood nearby otherwise we were completely alone.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Very nice parking area. Near a cemetery and a small chapel. Water but Im not sure its drinkable. Beautiful ocean view Easy access for 67 meters.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Stony and narrow path to the spot but right on the water and no people around. I recommend fourwheel drive and scratchresistant paint that wont get scratched by the bushes.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.93)
properties.description: Parking Poitelj ideal to visit the city

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: 1 Day parking 80kn.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Parking at the top of the village. Very peaceful and very quiet. It does not have any service but it is next to the town. Near the parking there are paths to get into and be even more hidden. Of course even if it is right next to the town at the top to get there you have to take a good detour.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: A parking space with access to the beach. We stopped here in the morning made coffee and walked to the beach but there was a motorhome next to us that spent the night there and apparently wasnt fired. There are no prohibition signs but you shouldnt have any problem with passing cars.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.8)
properties.description: Parking of the Motel Park and the house of the Park Prirode Hutovo Blato. Possibility to stay overnight included in the park entrance ticket as we understand it. No service. Very calm at the end of October. It is a swamp area lots of insects Nice place but not very well laid out for walking or cycling especially this season when the marshes are flooded the trails too. Possibility of boat trip to discover the park and its fauna. Picnic table. Restaurant at Motel Park where you can pay by card. For the rest payment in cash only at the house of the park friendly welcome in English.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.88)
properties.description: We spent a first night next to the lighthouse right out of the ferry as well as a second night before taking the ferry. Very quiet location with a magnificent view of the Croatian coast There was no one at the lighthouse which may not be the case in high season ...

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: Replacement at the waters edge. follow a dirt road that starts further north on the road.

properties.name: Picnic area (3)
properties.description: Fresh water source with parking space and rest area bench with table. Waste container available.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice place near the road in the morbing there are peaceful corridors the place is free and you have a nice view

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Cave parking with no overnight stay bans. Below there is a course with wooden plots and waterfalls free entry and another car park where it is possible to spend the night as there are no restrictions.very nice corners to see.Pay attention to the opening hours of the caves which are not always respected. in low season for us

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Small bay surrounded by nature. We had a very good night and only met a few fisherman in the evening. There is a trim passing a few times a day which isnt perfect but not very noisy either. The way there is narrow so its nothing for big Campers. Sadly not free of trash but you can help by taking some with you.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)

Nice church courtyard with lots of shade and benches for hot days.

We didnt see anyone but the place is probably popular with locals on weekends and summer.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.8)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.25)
properties.description: A large gravel bed right on the Neretva River. Was recommended to us by a local. The driveway is relatively steep from the main road see picture but should be feasible with almost everyone. If the river has a lot of water the gravel bed is probably flooded.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.8)
properties.description: Parking at the swimming pool free not too big but quite empty. Good place to park during the day and a 10minute walk to the center the city is quite crowded and tight. Toilets and showers available at the pool entrance fee a few KM but when we wanted to enter after 500 pm the lady said that we can go for free. In the evening there was more traffic there is a pub by the pool and we decided not to sleep there.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Parking at the stadium. 1.5 kilometers along the Neretva to the center. Day and night no problem.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

Suddenly it got very crowded in the evening the parking lot was full within an hour Lots of people started coming to the local cafes and restaurants. Fortunately also quickly from 11pm it got empty we were almost alone at night. A very safe night peace and quiet apart from a few minutes of calling from the mosque around 5 am  A place rather for campervans something bigger can be a problem.

There is a height bar at 2m50 but the keeper can remove it to let you pass if you are higher. The road to get there is very poorly maintained. Almost 20km on a path in very poor condition. The road coming from Sarajevo is a little easier than on the other side. The village is very nice to see and there are walks to do. There is a drinking fountain in the village near the mosque.

Turn right go 100m and youll find the park next to the wooden bench.Great park to visit the waterfall 2 minute hike to the base or for an overnight stay. The drive out here is fantastic AND you will pass a monument with ice cold drinkable water streaming through 5 taps.Note that this area does NOT have phone reception

properties.name: Extra services (5)

Quiet at night only some locals which enjoy the view on top of the city. Toilets are also useable but they close at 8pm and open at 7am.

properties.name: Extra services (3.75)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: Beautiful and peaceful place in the middle of a ruined village. You can see the sun going down behind the mountains. The way there is easy to drive on.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: A wonderful place to spend one or two days. Beautiful nature the possibility of walking. Medieval monuments Steci. There is no water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Excellent viewpoint with little spring that didnt work. We stayed for one night very quiet on the road. Locals were waving at us when they drove past so we felt perfectly safe and welcome. One wild dog came by we named him Rex.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Undisturbed night except for a dog growling turned out to be really sweet in the morning. Easy access almost no cars during the night. Plenty of hiking routes around. Gets cold at night event in October.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)

Go down in the small path just before the bridge accessible to all unlike the previous area 500m before where you need a 4x4 to go up.

properties.name: Extra services (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

Some highway noise but a great stopover for a night or two.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: For large vehicles to visit Sarajevo we have a 12tonne and 10meterlong motorhome paid parking next to a park very easily accessible to all sizes. Tram station 10 minutes on foot to reach the city center of Sarajevo cross the park then the pedestrian bridge. We only stayed during the day but possible at night not supervised at night. Very friendly staff. Normal motorhome rate 5km per hour and free at night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.11)
properties.description: Parking at the thermal pool Ilida Thermal Riviera It costs 1 km for the first hour then 0.5 km for each additional hour. Were allowed to stay here too. Perfect for a visit to the thermal baths for the huge indoor playground and there is also a good restaurant. Planespotting is also possible Sarajevo Airport is right next door.

properties.name: Extra services (4.43)
properties.description: You can fill any type of bottles at Proming. It is in an industrial zone turn right at the gas station.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Free place about 8 minutes walk from the Sarajevo Tunnel Museum. Would fit 3 vans or a large motorhome. I didnt try to sleep here but to visit the tunnels. Enjoy

properties.name: Extra services (4.55)
properties.description: Mbali automatic laundry. Easy to park nearby and unbeatable price. Very helpful smiling employees who speak good English. The laundry is drop and go.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.25)
properties.description: According to the waiter of the restaurant the safest place to park and stay overnight in Sarajevo. Lots of social control. Shops around the parking lot. Very quiet. Spent the night here. Old town at 8 km. Taxi on the corner at 100m 15 minutes to the center.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: TDM gas station. If you need to refill your bottles this is the place for you. Operator nice.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Neskovic tank station. They have an adaptor to fill a gas tank with LPG. Friendly service.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Faucet behind the washing station. A Gardena connection can be connected here. Pressure is great too. We dont know if its drinking water. Have it additionally filtered. looks clean

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Car wash with excellent tap to be able to fill the tanks directly with the connection from the hose. Flow is good. The tap is at the bottom on the left.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.94)
properties.description: Good place for discreet vans we stayed 3 nights this November. Its a huge parking lot and no one keeps track of the cars also used by locals to leave car during day and take public transport. Friday and Saturday you will see multiple couples dating around the parking lot. Water available in the gas station 200m away

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.12)
properties.description: It is a paid car park. We asked the guard if it was a secure car park he told us there was no theft here. So we left our motorhome all day to visit Sarajevo and we had no problem. The rate is 1kmhours for cars we paid 2kmhours for our motorhome. Access is easy and there is space to park.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.86)
properties.description: Above Sarajevo directly at Sunnyland summer toboggan run and co there are two large and currently still free gravel places. We stayed here while touring the city. Taxi from here to the city costs about 15 KM.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: I park at the end of a dead end street adjacent to a park across which there are a couple of bakeries.The access road is narrow so access for large motorhomes is not recommended.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.8)
properties.description: Near the old town of Sarajevo about 2 km walk free of charge and very quiet at night as of March 2019

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Great place with a spectacular view of Sarajevo. Right next to the road there is a kind of forest road where we park because we no longer use it for cars. We stayed here at night and the whole time only two very quiet cars passed. The place itself is a bit uneven but when you stand up you have a wonderful view of Sarajevo and the surrounding mountains.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.11)
properties.description: Private parking in the center of Sarajevo. No services and probably a bit noisy in summer due to the terrace bar being constructed I stayed in summer 2016. It is super safe accesible and very central.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.42)
properties.description: Guarded parking super well placed 2 min walk from the cathedral and the Latin bridge. Entrance is tight ok for van and small camper. 20 marks 24h no problem to sleep. There are places in the shade.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Large guarded carpark for quick access to old town of city by crossing over the bridge. 2 KM an hour.  We slept night in van after fun evening without any problems.  Probably not suited to motorhomes but fine for our hightop MB Sprinter.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Right at the old observatory. From here you have a very good view of Sarajevo which is particularly worthwhile at night. To get to the place you have to drive up the path to the viewpoint at the end of the concrete surface below. Ground clearance required With our 407D 6m Ddo without offroad tires or the like it worked even in the dark and rain.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Guarded parking without Installations. Approach only with smaller compers till t5 size. Have paid 12Eur for 16h. In the meantime possible to return to the car. Even sleeping in the car there would be no problem. 2 minutes to the city center. Accessible only over narrow streets.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: LAUNDRO LOUNGE Very good service For 15 KM washing drying folding To find the room you have to enter a courtyard where you can find various signs.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.9)
properties.description: Nice place with a wonderful view with a capacity of 6 caravans up to 3 and a half tons. Somewhat difficult approach.

properties.name: Extra services (3.5)
properties.description: Easyaccess tap at the level of the Orthodox Church.

properties.name: Extra services (4.5)
properties.description: Fountain with running water on the roadside. Parking next to it possible with a smaller vehicle.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: VanSized Spot Overlooking SarajevoThis is a perfect place for an overnight stay overlooking the city lights of Sarajevo.The park is up a steepyetmanageable incline at the base of a hiking trail which leads to the abandoned bobsled track. The road is sealed right until you reach the spot which is rubble and grass. Further up is a continuation of the road however the ground isnt ideal for driving.Due to the size of the park and the narrow approach this is only recommended for vans.We stayed one night without any interruption

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.47)
properties.description: Parking 10 minutes from the center of Sarajevo. No service but convenient for visiting the city and also for the night quiet because away from the road. it is an abandoned sports area flat square and a bit of shade on one side.Behind the Mali museum easy to spot.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.14)
properties.description: Parking Trebevi near olimpic bob track.Not safe.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.86)
properties.description: Parking in front of the white fortress which is permanently closed sothat there are hardly any vehicles on the square. Magnificent view of the city and the mountains.Even ground.no service

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.67)

Quite busy during the day with hikers and cyclists but gets calm at night. According to locals this is the best place to camp for the night. In fact the owner of a nearby paid camping also recommended it when he saw that his camping was too expensive for me. Enough space for a bunch of campers. Overnight parking should be legal and free. Seen some wild horses around sunset.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.11)
properties.description: Car park with around twenty spaces no height limitation. Day and night unsupervised and without service. Large play area for children the river passes right next to it with bench and picnic table at the waters edge. Climbing site next to the car park. Many people during the day jogger hiker cyclist but we were alone from 8 p.m. Quiet area and ideal for one night.

properties.name: Extra services (4.76)
properties.description: Drinking water point.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.6)
properties.description: Day and night parking very quiet public fountains nearby to charge water

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)

properties.name: Picnic area (4.5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

Supermarket accessible via small stairs in 5 minutes.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.55)

Very busy in the day hard to exit the car park in the afternoon only arrivedepart in the morning or night. The last road down is narrow and has tight corners it would be difficult to get down in a larger camper ours is 6m. Stayed for 2 days 1 night with no issues

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.63)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.83)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.8)

We have seen fee scuba divers there so it might be suitable for diving.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.27)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.41)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.17)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.2)

The cave is undergoing archaeological research. careful winding road to get there but we were a van and a 7m motorhome.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.29)
properties.description: Free and quiet location off of a single lane sealed road approximately 7km from the border of Montenegro and Bosnia and Herzegovina. The location is accessed by driving off the road over grass on a narrow gradient uphill. There is room for approximately 35 vehicles depending on size. There are no height or width restrictions and there is minimal shade. Not recommended for large motorhomes due to small turning circle and uneven ground. There are very few absolutely flat pitches. There are no amenities available including public waste bins however there is no rubbish in the locality. There is 4G internet connectivity available. Vans are moderately visible from the road but privacy is afforded and the road is not frequently used.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)

properties.description: Possibility of quiet sleep parking on a deserted road. On the maps marked as a bike trail around Lake Slano jezero. The lake is beautiful but unsuitable for swimming.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.88)
properties.description: At the edge of the little road with little traffic offering a very nice view of the lake. Easily accessible for any type of vehicle.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: We spent a wonderful and quiet evening and morning here. After sunset came a few mosquitoes but with mosquito repellent it was ok. The pitch offers a magnificent view of the lake and the islets.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.29)
properties.description: A very nice place to spend night and evening quiet on the edge of the lake

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.2)
properties.description: Pebble parking at the edge of the water. A night spent in April. No problem. The police passed without saying anything. Passersby are friendly.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.13)
properties.description: Location at the lake accessible any vehicle and easily.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Large parking lot in front of the restaurant overnight stays are tolerated inexpensive clean and good restaurant with local and international dishes. Super nice service.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.25)
properties.description: Several nice place between the hills. Only in dry weather if dont have 4x4. Grassy dirt bumpy road but we had no problems with our 6m long Citroen Jumper. You can use Google satellite map to find the road easily.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.17)
properties.description: A very nice place with a view over the lake Krupac. Behind the parking lot in front of the last houses take the small path up to the right and then straight on. There are many anglers around the lake everyone said hello very nicely. Unfortunately there is a lot of rubbish lying around. A few teenagers were there until shortly after midnight. I wouldnt recommend the spot over the weekend. Later we were alone with the frogs. A herd of goats came by in the morning.

properties.name: Picnic area (4.33)
properties.description: A parking area next to a big playground with picnic tables. We only park here during the day as a stopover but seems great for the night as well

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: On the M18 turn right at the direction indicator Dolma. You arrive at a large paved parking lot near a church. No service. Ideal for 1 night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.75)
properties.description: Parking of the Pivski Monastery. Very calm

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: An old quarry site with flat pitches for most vansmotor homes. From the main road there is a large layby area with a single grass track coming off it. Follow the track for around 100m to the spot. We had no difficulty in a 2wheel drive 6m van but if youre unsure you can scout it on foot. Nice view over the valley very quiet at night we were completely undisturbed.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: A flat space of grassland at the roadside of a rarely used road at the piva lake. A few steps up the hill or at the roadside one can enjoy a beautiful view of the lake. Mobile service is also only available if you walk up the hill. The road leads to a bridge over the lake and you can access the lake there to put in canoes.To reach the spot it is strongly recommended to use the road coming from the etno village Izlazak down the canyon over the bridge and up the other side. This road is paved but a bit narrow with sharp corners so bigger RVs may have some problems. Following the road northbound will probably get you back to the M18 but with non paved sections. We tried to get to the P14 the next day and realized that the connection via the serpentines north of Boricje is very tricky steep and rocky even with offroad vehicles.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Several parking options in the middle of the mountains at Piva Lake. The parking space is very quiet despite being directly connected to a road. 1020 cars came by over the course of the day. Internet reception wasnt a problem for us 4G full bars. The surface is a little uneven but that shouldnt be a problem. The journey should definitely take place via the Most Brae Gagovi Bridge. This path goes moderately uphill for a good 7km until you reach the destination. The road is in good condition and can be done without any problems with our Sprinter 7m.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Small square with a beautiful view in the middle of nowhere its a small bulge off a dirt road leading to a power pole. If you stand a little further in you can hardly be seen from the path. The way there finally leads through a densely overgrown gravel path. But we got through it with our 7.5 ton truck. Scratches are free. But you are very undisturbed and can meet a pack of strays in the morning. The view is incredibly beautiful

properties.name: Picnic area (4.36)
properties.description: Very nice picnic place with table benches roof. max 3 vans. Awesome view over the canyon.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: A small parking area over looking the massive lake. Stunning scenery. No services.

properties.name: Picnic area (4.31)
properties.description: Wind quiet beautiful panorama.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.3)
properties.description: Gravel path leads a few meters from the road. The place in not visible. Mountain views. Protected by a few trees.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: A beautiful place with a view of the mountains. You are away from the road and can choose to be completely hidden. Not suitable for large camper vans.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.78)
properties.description: Quiet spot near the main road but far away to not be disturbed. Locals passed by and just waved. Beautiful rolling hills surround the spot.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.29)
properties.description: Nice large free parking place in the middle of a small village. we have stayed for two nights without any problem. Great place to start hike towards Maglic. Amazing view. There are 4km of paved road in the direction to Maglic from here but it is narrow and there is no free parking place after this one. Only at the end place for one van at an homestay.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Grassy area at the village welcome sign. The village itself seems to be half empty. The remaining people didnt mind us spending the night. Just wave to them as they drive by

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: On the panoramic road between Zabljak and Pluzine

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.85)
properties.description: Very nice place in the center of Durmitor mountains. We stayed for one night and it was amazing. Ranger comes by to collect national park fee

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.8)
properties.description: Another stop on the side of the road with a wonderful view of the mountains. . Very quiet night with only a few cars passing by. Some people stop to take photos but we spend the night alone.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Superb little corner of nature right on the side of the road very quiet. Super beautiful view of the Durmitor massif. Perfect place to start the hike to the Bobotov summit 2525m. 1 place only. A national park ranger comes by in the morning to charge 5 per person for access to the park  3 for the van.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: The course is right on the channel of the Zeta River. There are flat spots so you can stand well. On the other side of the canal shepherds pass by with their flocks. It can be reached via a gravel road but it is easy to drive on.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.87)
properties.description: We stayed here for one night. It is by the side of the road but very few cars passing at night and no trouble from the park ranger.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Paved free parking next to the castle ruins.  Slightly slopping. We didnt stay for the night but it looks like it will be a quiet place.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Nonautomatic laundromat staffed for washing drying and ironing. Cheap price 6 for a tour.

properties.name: Extra services (4.5)
properties.description: Well hidden under a tree. Parking is possible.

properties.name: Extra services (4.92)
properties.description: Gas station cafe water

properties.name: Picnic area (4)
properties.description: Picnic area with views of the gorge

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Gas station with long water hose by the trash bins

properties.name: Extra services (4.25)
properties.description: Small spot close to the tourist route number 2 departure of several hikes. Water  garbage cans available.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.2)
properties.description: Big parking near Rafting center DrinaTara Bastasi near river Drina

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Spot in the countryside by the river for two vans maximum. Magnificent river access only by vans.

properties.name: Extra services (3.67)
properties.description: Drinking water

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Large parking area next to a gas station with paved area and gravel area. We slept here on a Friday a lot of movement of vehicles and some people but nobody bothered us. The gas station restaurant is great huge portions and affordable price. There are also a couple of dogs that live in this car park and they appreciate any detail you have with them.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.38)
properties.description: Parking near restaurant Antik Brod na Drini

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Nice quite calm place panoramatic views fireplace. Old mine. There was some locals who told us camping is 100 possible. Some farmers houses around but nobody was there.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Ideal parking lot for a city tour. About 5 minutes walk to restaurants ice cream parlors and shops.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Old quarry site just off the Scenic road 2. Set back from the road to give some privacy and quiet although there is very little traffic at night. No particular view and a bit of trash around but flat and with plenty of space. We stayed here for free and no warden checked us and asked us to pay which happens in most of the spots in this area.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: A very nice and quiet place to stay with direct access to the Drina river.We stayed here one night with an old Hymer. We only found it by chance as we wanted to sleep here one night on the Drina. When we arrived there were 2 local fishermen here but that was not a problem. The driveway is a bit narrow and we had to cross a very narrow bridge. Mobile homes and small vans are not a problem.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: A small flat land exposed to the wind a little away from the road panoramic road 2 accessible by a narrow dirt road about 100m long see photo. Some sheepfolds around are abandoned. Alone in the world the place is very quiet. The place offers a magnificent view of the Durmitor park with the possibility of hiking directly from the spot. For long vehicles it is difficult to turn around on the spot.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Viewpoint where you can stand in the evening to spend the night it is allowed in the national park. Ranger came and wanted a fee. Perfect view over the plain. Two seating areas are also available. This space should be made available to other guests during the day. Its on the road but almost no cars passed by at night. Of course take rubbish including used toilet paper back with you. We were there with a VW T6

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.4)
properties.description: Coming from the direction of Zabljak you can take the first dirt road on the left after the hairpin bends descending the Prevoj Sedlo pass in open terrain. The shepherdess comes by in the afternoon and is happy if you make her wish come true for a few euros. In the morning the ranger wakes you up at 8am and knocks on the car and you pay per person for the entrance to the national park and for overnight parking. The advantage over Camp Sarban is that the sun is much longer at night and you can see the valley waking up as the sun rises.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Ski station parking and restaurant closed in summer. ideal for picnic or overnight stay.Very quiet and secluded.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.1)
properties.description: Parking spot for hikers on the SedloPass 1900m hight. Windy but a very nice view. Starting point for hikes to Bubotuv Kuk. We were staying there overnight with 2 other campers. In the morning the ranger showed up to collect  nationalpark entrance fee per person.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.75)
properties.description: Runoff strip along the road Panoramic route 2 a few cars in the evening very quiet at night no one passed.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Grass hills on the edge of the very little traffic Dumior ring road. You can drive a few meters in. There are several ways to stand and spend a night. It is very quiet and the environment is amazing. Even for very large vehicles.Take your rubbish back with you

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.26)
properties.description: Parking in front of a restaurant directly at the Sedlo pass  from Zabljak shortly before. The restaurant was already closed at the beginning  middle of October so we were all alone. Very quiet Great sunrise Especially in the high season it can here as on all pitches that in the morning a ranger comes and cashed.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.21)
properties.description: The parking lot at the panoramic viewpoint on the Taraschlucht at 431138.04N 190522E after turning off the panoramic route. In the evening and at night four cars heading towards a small village in the valley. A wonderful night in an idyllic forest. After a morning walk along the road the first tourists arrived in the morning along with the ranger who collected the entrance to the park.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.75)
properties.description: Quiet place difficult access stony path near a magnificent village view of the surrounding windy massifs we spent a night there without problem

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Water and nice view

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.86)
properties.description: Hiking parking. Absolutely quiet at night. During the day some hikers.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Several locations by the river. Very nice calm the day some walkers fishermen and a very nice lady who walks his goats. We spent a very quiet night there. Possibility of bathing attention the level of the water varies from   1 meters according to the dams. Access by bridge and turn narrow only for van.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Parking in front of a small golden chapel visible from the road. A small sign indicates it just follow the dirt path which goes up a little. Perfectly accessible for a van 6m long and 72hp. With even a tarmac section in front of the chapel.A small cemetery is nearby but it is rather quiet at night Unpopular place and the chapel is closed.Ideal place for dogs and there is not too much waste.View of the surrounding countryside.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: washing machine

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.45)
properties.description: Large parking lot right next to the beach we arrived in the evening there was no one anywhere just a few parked motorhomes. In the morning a person sits at the entrance and probably pays for parking according to information from neighbors from the motorhome parking is free. I recommend coming in the evening  beautiful beaches with full service sunbeds and toilets paid 100m from the parking lot a shop with cheap products.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.43)
properties.description: Free pitch in Jaz near Budva. Choose a good place to park during the day since cars also park everywhere

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.75)
properties.description: We spent a night without a problem at the beginning of July in the parking lot of the fort which does not seem very touristy. So very quiet no prohibition sign. Magnificent 360 degree view. Path in poor condition but accessible with a van van or small motorhome. The center and the beach are accessible in 25 min on foot by the forest sports or the road.A water tap is located just of the main road.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.75)
properties.description: Parking within walking distance to the old town.It can get a little tight on the exit but we got along well with our 6 m mobile.Friendly staff.No height limit.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Great laundry service. We gave out three big bags of detergent at noon. At 430 p.m. everything was washed dried and folded. Since there is no selfservice laundry service around its great when you travel.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.4)
properties.description: Good parking lot to get into town.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.6)
properties.description: Just park your motohome there. its cost  0.6 per hour.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Loose gravel parking bay off of the bend in a road leading from Budva to Krapina Village. Beautiful views overlooking Budva. No amenities available and quite a lot of rubbish in the surrounding foliage. Able to park around 15m20m from the road which does not seem to be in frequent use. There are some cows wandering around the area not in paddocks. The road to access this park is sealed but in places is quite narrow and winding therefore this may not be an appropriate park for large motorhomes. All vans should be able to manage comfortably.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.42)
properties.description: Parking at the end of the Budva beach. Nice view of the old town. Not a lot of car during the day. Disco at night.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Selfservice laundromat

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.14)
properties.description: Free Park near the main road noisy place for overnight no services.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.86)
properties.description: Free parking with no time or height restrictions for 12 vehicles adjacent the entrance to Krapina Village where you can see and pat donkeys chickens geese and other animals for free. There is a pristine small waterfall and swimming hole within 300m uphill of this car park.You may be able to stay here overnight we did not try. Some access roads are steep and quite narrow. All roads are sealed. May not be suitable for large motorhomes but vans should be okay.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.72)
properties.description: Budget car park near Budva Ample

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Toll parking. Quick access to the beach lots of shade. On the beach there are few restaurants.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.25)
properties.description: Sloping parking lot in the forest a little above Sveti Stefan accessible 15 minutes on foot by nice walk in the forest by the beach. It seems disused because the tar and the pitches are a bit high. Beware of the GPS access seems impossible from above the road is broken. As if you are going down to the parking lot of Sveti Stefan a road goes on the right to the location. Arrived along a wall there is a guitoune closed in winter and the bottom of the parking lot is reserved for taxis. Continue to climb it is possible to park more or less flat on the gravel.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Water tap right on the street.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.15)
properties.description: Between parking and a place of nature located by the sea with superb views. Cars during the day but quiet at night. Narrow  steep road to get there. Anything longer than 6m will have trouble at the last bit.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.58)
properties.description: Flat dirtgravel area near lookout over Sveti Stefan. Hill fairly steep and narrow to get up took it slow in our mwb camper. Parked near trees for the night. Awesome views Small fountain near monument around the corner to fill up some water bottles.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.55)
properties.description: Up a mountain trail on a church parking that offers views of the whole Budva bay. Incredible 360 view and sunset Noone bothered us at night and really quiet place. 2m80 height max to access and no amenities

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

The road is a bit   bumpy at the end but we had no trouble Renault Trafic.Amazing view of the sunset from the church located 200 m further it is also possible to park there but the ground is not level. We got the visit of a little cat that knew how to ask for food take care of her if she passes by And please clean the place before you leave

properties.name: Extra services (2.8)
properties.description: Continuing from the view point above Sveti Stefan there is a spring on the road.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: On an abandoned sports field and next to a cemetery.Quiet place.We spent one night here without any problem close to Kotor.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.8)

Its good to be alone unfortunately there is garbage around. You can see the mobile home from the houses in the surrounding mountains but not from the nearby road.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Clear water in the petrol station next to bottled gaz cage

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.62)
properties.description: Platform  parking overlooking the sea with a very nice view. Quiet place to spend the night. The soil is fairly flat. At about 100m from the main road. at the foot of a small chapel.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: A nice spot in the national park. Very quite green and picturesque. The entrance is through a small paved road not marked on Google Maps. Coming from the parks visitors center where you are supposed to buy a camping permit continue about 1km towards the mausoleum where you will see a very sharp uphill left turn with a small sign of a bike road leading to Kotor. Probably too narrow for big campers but ideal for smaller vans.

properties.name: Extra services (4.33)
properties.description: Source right next to the road several locals came to fill bottles and cans while we filled up with water. No tap so impossible to fill by putting a hose. Excellent flow. After a few days drinking this water we confirm that it is drinkable

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.49)
properties.description: Authorized place in front of the visitors center. 34 places. Route getting up difficult and narrow. Water 500m away. Pick nick tables and hiking routes.  Offseason its free.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.32)
properties.description: Beautiful view over the Mediterranean from Budva to Kotor. The fort of 1886 can be visited

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Place for a van in a small recess 50m from the road flat place. Place well hidden by the trees not overlooked by the road and therefore very quiet. Quite easy to access with our more complicated peugeot expert with a motorhome. Magnificent view of Mount Jezerski at sunset and sunrise. Good 4g reception for us. It is best to go in reverse as there is little room to turn around.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.88)
properties.description: Large clearance off the main road it is accessed by a small paved road. We parked there to go up to the top of Mt Lovcen and had a very quiet night there.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Parking at the entrance to Petrovac 10 walk from the seafront. The parking below does not accept motorhomes. Nothing special but roomy and very easy to get to.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Drinkable water bubbles out of the wall here and the locals also regularly come here with their 7l bottles and fill them up.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.55)
properties.description: Large gravel parking lot in the immediate vicinity of a magnificent viewpoint. Very quiet at night we stayed here for two days. The place is clean make sure it stays clean and take your toilet paper with you

properties.name: Extra services (4.25)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.44)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.31)
properties.description: A great place for a quiet stay. Nice view of the mountains. Excellent mountain walks marked hiking trail nearby. There is no water. At night in August the temperature is 710 degrees.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

properties.name: Extra services (3.8)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.59)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Extra services (4.12)
properties.description: Friendly guy who refilled our German 5kg gas bottle with no problem Open 7am2pm daily. Bottle 13kg France it puts 10kg. camping gas bottle 3kg ok.

properties.name: Parking MH without service (4.75)
properties.description: This campsite is openly accessible to campers outside the season. nice view of the bay. nearby hotel and terrace for food and drinks.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.66)
properties.description: Very large parking lot. Ideal location for visiting the city. Constant street noise. There are always free places.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.17)
properties.description: Free parking close to the old town.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Small paying car park. Next to the bus station. Guardian at the entrance. Ideal for visiting Kotor. Climb the fortress. The market is open from 6 a.m. to 3 p.m. Great restaurant near the citadel SteakBarbecue house.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Roadside parking place for one vehicle quiet at nightGreat view of the bay of Kotor

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.76)

properties.name: Parking MH without service (4.46)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.8)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Several small spots on this road. We arrive after a few kilometers in a small village. Possibility to park in front of the church. We stayed here for one night at 2 vans. No problem. Very calm.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.67)

To get there you have to take the gravel road on the left leaving the paved road.

properties.name: Extra services (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.7)
