properties.description: Here is a large flat grassy area next to the E80  M2 way. Be careful not to miss the exit a small dirt road leads to the place approx.  100 meters further back if you come from the direction of Duga..

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.98)
properties.description: Nice parking lot right on the river in a gorge. Access via gravel road going off the road at the fork left Super opportunities for swimming in the crystal clear river water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: A restaurant on the road worth a visit. The view is breathtaking and the prices very correct. I was offered a second beer on the spot The property even offered to sleep in the parking lot for free but it was too roadside for me. Possible to stop right in the parking lot and not consume anything.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Large square stone  earth in front of the motorway bridge. You drive past the Chinese barracks.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Drinking water fountain with tap directly at the gas station. Fresh and good water confirmed by the manager of the very friendly and helpful resort.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: Just at the entrance of the tunnel coming from Taras bridge there is a small path on the left. It is a dead end behind the tunnel no noise even near the road and a great view with the gorges below that you can hear. The place is not perfect as there is some rubbish but great for a free night with a nice view on waking. The floor is not quite flat. We went in early October so maybe during the season its different ....

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.83)
properties.description: Parking lot with access to Rafting Tara in Montenegro. Good location unfortunately also at night. No one minds standing here at night.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Quiet location on the road to the monastery. By the monastery itself I do not recommend going down with a trailer.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: Quiet sunny small esplanade at the hairpin. Almost flat for 2 vehicles. About 3 or 4 vehicles passed during the day. 100m from La Chapelle where you can probably also land. Personally we could not go down to La Chapelle maximum height 3m30 3.5 for us. Road suitable for any vehicle.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Water point Locals told us that it is drinkable and filled their bottles. Area to stop along the road

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Small parking on a rock just before the small village. There is a hike for the lake in height and the old school in the cave during the war to find nearby in the foliage. Read the map on the board before the hike to find the lake  count 4h and 600 m of elevation gain. You will find the departure after the restaurant on the right 100 m from the car park.

properties.name: Picnic area (4.57)
properties.description: Nice little lake Lots of possible locations around the lake Locals come there during the day but very quiet at night and in the morning Some picnic tables and swimming possible Through an access there was a barrier but people opened it up to us without worry and with a smile Overall little waste

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Coming from Visegrad on a solitary Road in quite bad shape we spend a night at this spot A public parking place with fees on working days in the middle of Pljevjav. In front of a good restaurant and park with playground. Plain ground on pavement.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Parking lot with view of the quarry below. Loads of space could easily fit more than 10 vans. Its right by the road and cars do pass by most of the night. We spent a lovely night here nevertheless. Note that there is a bug curb to get on to the parking lot.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Quiet place right on the lake. Havent bathed but seems possible. A few local anglers who gave me a friendly hello. Short walk to the lake possible.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Nice place by the lake. Easy toad brand new asphalt at the begining and stones after. Ok for all kind of vehicules.Really good view. please take care of that peacefull place.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking just before Meandri ehotine viewpoint. Access is via a narrow gravel road. Okay with a van but not suitable for motorhomes. The parking lot is quite flat. In the evening a few young people came by but then left again. Had a very quiet night. Unfortunately there is a lot of rubbish lying around please dont fill it up with more rubbish.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: As much on the road the slightest stops are littered with rubbish as we came across a nugget at the end of a small grassy path. You dont have to be clumped but most vehicles can pass. We are for lunch but I think we can sleep there. Superb quiet view.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Drinking water point with tap. Departure of several hikes information given at the building behind the fountain downloadable routes on the Tara Park website essential for some of the hikes

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.4)
properties.description: Great spot good night  alone

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Mountain hut. Please ask

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: A quiet place on an artificial lake with a view of a flat rock Ravna stena.  Above is a privately owned water mill and picnic area but every nature lover is welcome.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.75)
properties.description: Large lot with trees we are next to a small river. There are also some chimneys. Very calm place. Please leave it clean

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice place on the dam. Right next to the road. Parking spot. There is a garbage can. Right next to the road but almost no traffic. Nice view over the water.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.53)
properties.description: At the edge of the lake widened river motorhomes can descend there. Dry toilets possibility of making a fire fishing covered picnic table. Swimming recommended. Absolute calm and beautiful landscape. Public place so free.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)
properties.description: Direct parking at the dam for 2 buses. It may be that at higher water levels the point is not accessible. Otherwise absolute peace. Stayed one night. Access from the road it goes down a narrow gravel road to the site.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Nice spot to spend a couple of nights or just spend the day. This seems that be one of the main beaches on the lake with very easy access.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.6)
properties.description: Nice spot to spend a night near the Lake. Really peaceful and easy access just off the main road. Access to the lake via the water treatment plant or via the huts on the left

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Source of water at the roadside. Parking ok. Decent flow. No possibility to connect a hose. Can filling.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Nice hiking car park where you can spend a quiet night. From here you can walk up to Pogdalena and enjoy the view of the Drina Canyon from the cliff in front.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Meadow on a hairpin bend with enough space for 23 vans. The view is incredible. The approach leads along a singlelane road that is constantly going uphill. The road is very well developed and can be easily mastered by almost all vehicles. Internet reception was available 4G3 bars.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Shed place just before a ski area. Long steep climb from mokra gora. Great view

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Small place to parking up to 4 cars. It looks like dead end Road.We spend here one night.Good place to start hiking to Zborite mountain.Picnic table near this point.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Water fountain.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.4)
properties.description: Parking area for Banjska stena overlook. The overlook is 1.4 km from the parking. We arrived late afternoon and watched the sunset from the overlook. After sundown everyone had left and we were the only ones left. Plenty of flat spots to park. Drinking water from tap. Some benches in the middle. Absolute quiet at night. The road in from Mitrovac is rockdirt but in good condition. Only small potholes and we drove 30kmh steady. Some wildlife one fox kept coming right up to us apparently accustomed to people. Really nice spot for one night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Nice overnight parking spot at a former hotel now police station.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.42)
properties.description: This is the upper parking lot of the railway.  We stayed here for one night.  The gates were open all night.  No one was interested in our motorhome.  There is free wifi here.  Train tickets sell out quickly.  We were advised to arrive an hour before the train departure.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.25)
properties.description: Parking for visit DrvengradKstendorf City of film editor Emir Kusturica

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.75)
properties.description: Parking near the waterfalls. Apparently its the shortest river in Europe. Worth stopping by especially if its a high t day. There is a restaurant on top of the second waterfall

properties.name: Picnic area (4.62)
properties.description: Nice quiet place with lots of trees for shade and next to a small stream. 5 minutes drive from Mokra Gora. Several picnic tables and stone circles for fires. Stayed with 5 vans of different sizes and only saw a couple of friendly farmers along the little road who waved and smiled.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Large paved parking lot next to the historic railway and small wooden chapel.  Small creek running next to it.  Everything is closed in late November.  Well lit.  Very quiet and peaceful.

properties.name: Picnic area (5)
properties.description: Nice spot at a picknick place easy accessible with a smal campervan. Few picknick tables and fire spot. Some traffic on the main road but peaceful night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: The road to the mineral springs is narrow and offers a few small parking bays. If you need more space you can stand next to a hotel ruin. A neighbor told me that nobody cares. A small street is in the immediate vicinity it leads to the healing springs but there is almost no traffic at night. Stand here because it is not possible to spend the night at the memorial.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.71)
properties.description: A huge parking place for campers in the tara mountains. its very cleanquiet and sunny.no service avaible. please take care to leave it clean and take your rubbish with u.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Recreation area with swimming possibility in cold river or made swimming pool with river water. Shower possibility no toilet. Possibly toilet at barrestaurant but it was closed when we were there. Next to bridge to Bosnia and Herzegovina which you sometimes hear. Advice not to park on asphalted road because there is frequent driving up and down. It is quieter on the grass section. May sometimes be bothered by young people at night. Furthermore it is a nice place and a good base to visit the village.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: water at the gas station

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.23)
properties.description: A large parking lot next to a cafe and supermarket perfect for maybe one more night to sleep in front of the border crossing with Albania and to have a coffee in the morning. If you park at the end of parking is also about 20 meters from the road.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice and calm place at an old church with a lot of shade in the morning. Short steep driveway but its possible to use two not so beautiful parking bays by the road when its wet. Not suitable for big motorhomes.Please dont leave trash there.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Water tap potable according to the station employee. Good flow

properties.name: Extra services (4.2)
properties.description: Fountain on the side of the road. you can park on the side. Very good pressure

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Drinking water point on a quite road about 5 minutes off the main road

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.43)
properties.description: Quiet parking at night 15 minutes from the Albanian border. Sea view in the distance. Prefer the lower space beware of the overhang for long vehicles.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Supet place with great views. Have only taken a break but the road is small and not very busy therefore it should also be good at night. GPS is not 100

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.2)
properties.description: Parking on the side of a calm road. Next to the viewing point. There are usb ports for charging your phone.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Guarded parking lot in Ulcinj. Entrance is regulated with barriers. Parking fee per hour. We parked here for free on a Sunday as both barriers were open. The old town can be reached in 10 minutes on foot. The parking lot is for all vehicles   6 Meter geeignet.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.6)
properties.description: Parking for swimmers near a supermarket on a side street with the sea view. On both sides bathing possibilities stone beach. Nice sunset good for one night. WiFi can be received from surrounding bars.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: A laundry that quickly washes and dries laundry even for tourists. The owner also speaks German. Very friendly service.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: This is a place just to park and go for a walk around the city.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: After cleaning the van in the service area we have been able to refill the clean water tank at a tap at the back of the area. Good water pressure for a short stop.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking area to visit Solana Ulcinj. Its at the end of the road so no through traffic. We parked for the day to visit the Salt lakes but didnt stay the night. However the security guy said it was no problem to sleep there. We would happily stay the night. Ideal to stay the night to visit the lakes early morning while its cooler. No services Space for 10  Campers Space for large campers. Ours pictured is 6.7m long Side road off the main road is very bumpy and unevenTheres industrial units nearby and farmland behind. It was very quiet during the day with a few campers and locals visiting the lakes.Visiting the lakes  The security guy is in the building next to the blue gate. Take identification passportdriving license for him to note your name in the book.Ask him if you want to rent a bike its free and we recommend it to get to the first lake alternatively its a 30 minute walk.Take lots of water and theres NO shade. Have fun

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Official car park ok for one night. Direct access to the old town.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.8)
properties.description: Very nice spot in the middle of nature with a pond and several wells. The locals use the one at the back which would therefore be a priori drinkable not tested.Limited but pretty view of the lake.Beautiful chestnut trees perfect for setting up a hammock.Nature and calm the locals are super welcoming and smiling. My favorite place in MontenegroThe hiking trail is worth it especially on the way back with beautiful views of the lake in the distance. The beginning is easy then it climbs hard and its rocky. Absolutely not Level Easy as indicated on the sign pictured.To come from the panoramic road follow the red markers of the hike. Asphalt road in good condition until the end. Overall straight ahead and the only place you have to choose is on the left.Only for vans and small riders because the end of the road is even narrower. If you try anyway know that there is a way to turn around just before the narrowest passage but you still have to get there already.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.65)
properties.description: Parking facing up to the old town of Ulcinj. Superb view of the sea and the city. Close to the center with all shops and restaurants. Arrived a little stressful by the center as narrow streets.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.44)
properties.description: Parking on the pier at the bottom of the fortress after a restaurant. Possible free out of season. Be careful when arriving at the port by a narrow road which is not one way. We encountered trucks with difficulty and a footboard hanging on a store step ...

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.59)
properties.description: Abandoned Resort parking lot. You pay the entrance regardless of the length of your stay. In the evening we were all alone very quiet from midnight during the day people come to park to go to the beach to picnic under the trees. Relatively few mosquitoes for the area. A water point on the paved part. Beach bars nearby.

properties.name: Extra services (4.67)
properties.description: Tarmac road wide and easily accessible. In front of restaurant water tap with drinking water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Land used as parking in front of the beach. no ban. we spent a peaceful night there. beach showerstoo bad people throw their trash next to the trash cans

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Just a parking area with a booth for green card insurance hotel and some shops. quiet at night just before the border and safe. No services no frills but ideal as a stop over before onward travelling   if tired and if sleeping is your only concern.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.56)
properties.description: Parking lot in the coniferous forest. Somewhat shady. It has trash cans and benches. Separate toilets and showers on the beach until November Sand is very fine sandy and 12km long. When the restaurants are open there is also WiFi. easy access even for large mobiles. Very good free camping spot. There are homeless dogs every night

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Parking by the beach. In the vicinity of a great restaurant where you can also pay by card. Public shower and toilet. Paid sun loungers. We stayed one night and it was no problem.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Perfect parking space for the off season everything is closed but the toilets are open but are not cleaned. Very quiet and the sea in front of the door

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: We stopped here one night its low season so its quiet. A small car park on the Vidikovac Stegvas where there is an excellent view of the lake. Too bad it is raining heavily today.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.42)
properties.description: Nice small place in front of some fisher boats under a small tree. Only place down here with some shade. 50m further on the other side. Water is nice and warm and you have a stone wall to lie on and jump in the water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.42)
properties.description: Great  Parking right next to the beach minibar toilets 24h shower with cold water on the beach quiet night

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.58)
properties.description: Parking at the end of the road at the level of the dike. Small pebble beach for swimming in the warm waters of the lake. For us departure of a canoe trip. Very quiet during the day but a concert of frogs at night. 10.2022 Attention the panoramic road 3 is a single track between Mali Ostros and VIRPAZAR 35km

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Fantastic place good old owner she is happy if you buy something among the delicious specialties. Drinks and ice cream are also available. The instructions are not suitable for a larger mobile

properties.name: Extra services (4.1)
properties.description: Petrol station with LPG can be filled at the German exchange gas bottles.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Great beach

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Grassy parking lot next to a rural church and cemetery. Located on farmland near the river so close to Albania across the river that the Albanian mobile signal is picked up. Very quiet rural setting about 2 km from the Ada Bojana bridge places by the river on both sides are worth seeing. Lots of shade and sunny spaces. Farm and farm park nearby. A midsummer respite alongside the busier waterfront establishments and beach that are nearby. Maybe a good stopover for the night but I didnt put it to the test. The access road is sealed but a bit bumpy in places. No problem to drive in a 35 x 5.5 m motorhome. The parking area is grass on hard packed dirt.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Patch of land to park on near the road with the views of the lake parked for the night and although its near the road it is generally quiet and no cars pass by there is a restaurant nearby to have breakfast in the morning too.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.29)
properties.description: Nice place to stand e.g. after crossing the border from Montenegro. We went swimming in the river but it had a lot of current so be careful. Lots of birds and in the evening a shepherd came by. Driveway a bit bumpy and overgrown. Not suitable for larger mobile homes.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.75)
properties.description: From this place you have a fantastic view of part of Shkodra and the two rivers that flow into each other. The driveway is twice a few meters unpaved and a bit difficult but our Berlingo made it well with little tire tread. The sleeping place is well suited for one night but there is only little space available which is why only a small van fits. The junction to the left of the path is on a slope and narrow but the view makes it worth going up if you are not completely afraid of gravel roads. In any case the space is tight which is why it is more suitable for an overnight stay than for a long day stay.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Filling German gas cylinders.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Parking Vataksi restaurant overlooking the river. The management of the establishment although very friendly offers free parking for overnight on paved sites. No service but wifi access enough perfectible on the parking.We have dined at the restaurant the services are excellent and the quality service is provided by a friendly dedicated and professional staff. Above all do not deceive yourself the carpark concerned is that of the restaurant Vataksi and not the adjacent parking which belongs to the neighboring restaurant refusing the parking of motorhomes.

properties.name: Extra services (4.23)
properties.description: Good water source used by many locals. The surrounding is not nice but you have to learn to ignore the rubbish in Albania.

properties.name: Extra services (4.5)
properties.description: Very nice and safe place. For 2 people the price was 21 euros. Kitchen available fridge and laundry as well.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.86)
properties.description: Flat space next to an abandoned building. Nice view of the lake and the city. Easily accessible even if a few trees rub shoulders at a height of 2.50m. Locals sometimes come in the evening but we spent a very quiet evening there. Fine for one night Just before you arrive you will come to a fork in the road keep right on the road through what was once a gate.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.4)
properties.description: Parking space near the city. Spectacular view. the last part of the path is gravel. Its best to use the satellite view as Google will guide you incorrectly. little rubbish please dont leave any there.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Facing the sea certainly the beach parking lot in high season. it was empty during our visit. Deserted area in October large normally dirty beach no service no noise a few cats and dogs but perfect for one night.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Gas Station

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.33)
properties.description: The parking is next to Bar Coffee Fama. It is family owned business the guy Zef stays there as security outside of season. He made us very welcome there allowed us to empty toilet fill water make fireshe provided firewood. Didnt asked for any money but its nice to make some contribution as a gift. Location is  in trees but suitable for large campers right on the beach easy access.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.78)
properties.description: Parking behind the sports stadium a lot of space. Ten minutes from the pedestrian area. Caf Valazina with wifi. Spar and other shops just around the corner. No service.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.09)
properties.description: In the courtyard of a beautiful mansion disused parking monitored 24  24h. Possibility to sleep there. Keepers nice and very helpful looking for solutions for us. Great base for visiting the center of Shkodr on foot They also wash cars the opportunity to make a clean shot during the ride

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Super nice laundry service. Did our laundry within 4 hours. Top result fair price

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.3)
properties.description: Easy parking in the middle of Shkoder. Very quiet for the location some shade. 5 minutes walk to the city center. 24h guarded 500 Leke

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.11)
properties.description: Beautiful and idyllic place. The journey was quite bumpy and took about 5 minutes along a gravel road but it was easily manageable with our large mobile home. In the morning we were greeted by cows.

properties.name: Extra services (2.67)
properties.description: Here you can have the entire motorhome washed. The local person was very polite and hardworking. If I had let him he would have cleaned my two bikes for the money. Underbody wash engine wash... everything is possible. He is also familiar with the conditions of solar systems and the heki windows.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Great car wash right next to a cafe. Bus Crafter MAN TGE outside for 5 EUR inside also possible. Vis a Vis super patisserie with takeaway Pastiveri Orkidea. Playground for children during the stay.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Didnt stay the night but looked like a good place to sleep. not too far from the city. just old lady with goats and beautiful views from the statue.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Faucet with a very good flow on the site of a big supermarket. At the fence to the left of the building. Very good parking.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.95)
properties.description: Big parking lot for the beach with restaurant and beach showers. We asked for the permission to stay overnight. They didnt have a problem. There was a security at night to watch restaurant. There are nice and clean toilets in the restaurant. The beach is very tidy although the pigs that come to search garbage didnt help. Very quiet at night. We were alone here. This is a solution if the nearby camping is busy.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.92)
properties.description: If you follow the road to the end you come directly to the lake. There is an area with stones but you can also park in the meadow. There you should be careful as this is partly very wet and you could get stuck. During the day locals are bathing here. Unfortunately they leave their garbage. If you park here take your garbage with you and maybe you will collect something else that lies around. Lead by example

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.56)
properties.description: Easy and wide enough access to any site from the restaurantcampsite RubensBe careful once you get to the lake dont go too far stay on the gravel. in case of rain you would get stuck

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Nice place right on the small sandy beach only a few locals and fishermen  horses and cows often visit. Very hot lake water but hey it feels good when its 45 degrees.The journey is a little bumpy you still need a good ground clearance but doable with large mobile homes more than 7m it still seems tricky to me.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Free large area right next to the expressway. Suitable for all sizes of motorhomes.We were looking for a way to stand during the night and found this place.Its right on the street but good for overnight stays.No indication that it would be forbidden.There is a pizzeria across the street.

properties.name: Extra services (3.67)
properties.description: Large Kastrati petrol station area with LPG and oilsliquids workshop next door. We asked friendly at the gas station for water we got it immediately. Very friendly service

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Quiet and nice place to spend a day and night. Very bumpy gravel road but doable without a 4x4 with an old Fiat Ducato camper. During the day very friendly local fishermen horses and sheep came by again and again. Access to the lake with many water lilies and other water plants. We were only out and about in a canoe ourselves and didnt swim. beautiful sunset

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Refill of a butane bottle for a VW California. Directly behind the gate on the right at the gas station.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.08)
properties.description: Pitch directly on a small lake. It goes along a small dirt road to the lake. We spoke to the locals and they said it would be no problem to stay here for one night. A great spot for anglers. There are mega carp in the lake.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.12)
properties.description: Quiet place close to the water.  There is a wooden lookout tower here.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.79)
properties.description: Grassy spot by a nice swimming place for locals Syri I Sheganit  karst spring. Lot of birds and frogs around. Lovely restaurant with nice food Skadar carp etc  WiFi nearby. Some mosquitoes at night but manageable. Access road is stony but OK if you go slowly. Not suitable for big motor homes.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.75)
properties.description: Very nice secluded place. There are small fishing boats on the shore but they werent used when we were here. Were alone all the time. The water is very refreshing and great for swimming. Great view  there was no evidence of private property.

properties.name: Picnic area (4.2)
properties.description: Nice place to picnic. is right on the street next to a cafe. This would still be in May. View over parts of the lake. unfortunately very lousy. Maybe this will be cleared away at times.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Supermarket with public toilets possible to dump wc cassete. Also fast WiFi drinking water and good shopping.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.15)
properties.description: Niagara Falls possibility to lose any size vehicle next to the falls. There is restaurant. we did not stay there just for a stop.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: A small rest area next to the road just before a small viewing platform and little traffic.From here a stairway leads down to the river and waterfall this is also an access to the riverside restaurant.We spent a quiet night here.

properties.name: Extra services (3.75)
properties.description: Distributor Alb Popaj Patrol

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

You should follow the following streets Raskrsnica  Vranjak then onto CT1 then onto Top Biking Trail 23. The last 4km takes about 30 minutes. Since the road only consists of a forest path.

On the square as relics of recent history there are two oneman bunkers and opposite on the other bank a bunker  shelter with two observation points and a small connecting passage. Right on the hiking trail to the Pejes Pass. If the currently clean and clear water from the stream is not sufficient a water point from the spring can be used in the further course of the hiking trail in approx. 700 m. Keep it clean Garbage cans are about 400 m along the stream  river towards Theth at the bridge Surrounded on three sides by large mountains with a mountain stream in the summer in spring when the snow melts this is a raging wide river but you dont get to Theth anyway because of the snow masses at the Thor Pass As well as some meadow and open forest. Maybe we were just lucky if you want to make sure you can ask the security man in the valley but since there is a lack of places in Koman we thought its definitely worth a try for everyone. Perfectly paved road to the place

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking with several places and possibility of turning around just before the tunnel.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.09)
properties.description: Very nice place right on the reservoir surrounded by nature. It leads a small road from the main road down to the water. There is a large paved place for several cars. We stayed there for one night and got visitors from locals who were very happy about our presence.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: This place is in the middle of nature and its beautiful place. Close to this area you will have drinking water and a very nice Guesthouse and restaurant with a good food. Place is very quiet and peaceful we stayed for two nights.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Beautiful spot in the dry riverbed of the Valbona. From time to time hikers come by and some vehicles during the day but at night you are completely alone and undisturbed. Access is only possible with a vehicle with slightly more ground clearance VW bus or van.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.29)
properties.description: At the end of the access road to the Vallbona there is possibility of free parking. Campers and AC of all sizes. There is a restaurant and guedhouse with good wifi. The road is new

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.67)
properties.description: High up at the local cemetery  church shady place from afternoon gravel road partly steep but possible without fourwheel drive with van and panel van. Mulberry tree right outside the door and a visit from a nice pig and cows guaranteed. 500 m up the street there is a spring on the left. Further up there is also an empty building with a level floor space and plenty of space.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: A small lake with a view of the mountain peaks. a great route for a motorcycle ride. a small village in the valley. I found this place choosing the wrong way to komani lake. this road ends with no asphalt. maybe a good choice if you have a 4x4. we stayed all night local people said no problem.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.75)
properties.description: Just a very short walk down from the road which isnt passable much except on Saturdays. Is also easily feasible with larger WOMOS. Some fire pits available. Great view of the mountains.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Best place for night in the van. quiet and in the forest

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Good place for off grid campers.. very quiet at the night close to many restaurants with traditional food even you can fill water tank.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.7)
properties.description: Pleasant location away from the road which is not very busy anyway. No water. Nice view.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Fountain with drinking water

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.76)
properties.description: Peaceful place away from the road at the entrance of a small clearing. Easily accessible for van or van.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Large open space on the side of the road where it is possible to park. going down the river bank there is a nice lawn

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Place in the middle of nature in the summer we find full of forest fruits drinking water to fill the water tank is 300 meter away. We loved this place.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Great parking space easily accessible for womos. We are there with 6 mt van. Simply beautiful in the middle of nature no evening disturbances.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Quiet place on the edge of the forest. About 400m from the road.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Beautiful pitch in the middle of nature on a small mountain stream. Attention Access without allwheel drive and with a short wheelbase just as possible provided it hasnt rained.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.57)
properties.description: The place is directly below the road and above a disused bunker where you could certainly stand. The place is very flat and clean. no shadow Absolutely perfect for one night especially when you need a break from the serpentine route.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Large paved parking area slightly set back next to the road. Calm night. Space and beautiful view. No service and lighting. Stop well before the edge the platform is floating 1.5 m. Minimum 20 places possible

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Great place for day and night out of season the road is so quiet 1 car per hour is a lot but only if the Ferry from Koman is no longer sailing. Good place you are level and have a nice view. Right on the road.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: LPGas fills German gas cylinders. TipToper Service  It has a whole set of adapters.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.78)
properties.description: Just offside the road. Very quiet and peaceful. Swimming possible.Perfect spot.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Very good plase with beautiful view.. we stayed for 2 nights and its quite quiet just 5 minutes from the Puka City center.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.56)
properties.description: Beautiful place by the river. A little passage on the track but not embarrassing. Some fishermen and people on foot very nice.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.88)
properties.description: Epic spot with spectacular views and really peaceful. You drive across the small bridge on your right as you reach the long straight and flat road into Valbone. The track is a bit rockybumpy but really worth it. Only suitable for smaller vans 6m because of restricted turn around opportunities and rocks. It was manageable in our 2wd. The track has a dead end just up from the park spot the bridge is the start point for a local hike that follows the track so there is a possibility of some hikers passing by. The GPS located position is best because it is hidden from view. It is possible to park 100m to the south with views over the river but you can be seen from the road easily. No services but the river at the bridge is good for a bath if you can brave the cold water. We stayed 3 nights.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.62)
properties.description: Place on the street. However this is rarely used. A little uneven. But nice view of the lake and the forest In addition there is a small bay for swimming in the reservoir. Unfortunately a bit littered like everywhere in the area. Did my best and collected some.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)
properties.description: Parking of the restaurant La Perla. First class cuisine with regional products. If you consume something you can easily stay overnight Place a bit diagonally. Very clean environment.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: A nice pitch near the water. Wonderfully quiet surrounded by nature. Access can be a bit worse due to water. At least currently. Access to the water is also possible for larger and higher 4x4 vehicles and trucks.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.83)
properties.description: Beautiful place for a short or long break in nature  right on the Valbona River. We also stayed here. A field path branches off the road. Along this there are some nice belays.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.75)
properties.description: Very quiet places with fresh air during the night those which avoid being devoured by mosquitoes. Unfortunately no spot in the shade but perfect for arriving in the early evening and leaving in the morning. Easy access.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Amazing site beside the Valbona river very quiet even on Friday before the first summer holiday weekend just a few meters from the main road perfect for one night after a tough driving trough the narrow zigzag roads. Scenic point.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Drinking water right on the street. Appears to be a mountain spring

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: This wonderful hiking parking lot is located in the middle of nature by the abandoned village of Bajrovia katun. To reach it you drive over a very rough road mostly gravel. With a van it wasnt a problem. There is a water spring nearby and Samels Cottage for local food and overnight accommodation. Everything is very natural mostly no internet reception and wonderfully quiet. Even during the day the parking lot was hardly frequented. You can hike very well throughout the national park peaks of the Balkans. There are also cycle routes. No waste or gray water disposal

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Beautiful parking lot in the saddle akor. A spring with drinking water nearby. Sometimes border police patrol here crossing to Kosovo is closed but no problem with parking there. Good starting point for trekking.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Nice place next to the Valbona river. Visited by locals for picnicking and fishing. Take the gravel road off the main road its a bit bumpy but not bad. turn around a lot of space below. There are places all along the way. Do not park too close to the water as the water level changes depending on the rainfall in the mountains. The bridge next door has a limit of 2.30 meters wide and 3.5 tons. Please note this when you arrive.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Large meadow between the bushes. Driveway bumpy and muddy in places. Some former bunker entrances on the slope to the north.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: Nice place in a clearing away from the street. Great view over the valley. Access via a short forest path. Spent a restful and quiet night here.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Grass area with a nice view. We did not stay here overnight but it looks like a good spot and we saw locals picnicing here as well. Access via a small track from the right corner of the field drive a bit further via the concrete road in the corner youll see the track to drive onto the grass.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.27)
properties.description: You can stay in the parking lot. Wifi is open food is cheap.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Beautiful 270 degree view from high up off the road Very quiet clean unvisited. However little shade and not for huge campers. You have three options dirt ground directly on the cliff edge fairly large and safe dirt ground shielded by trees or driving down a small slope to camp in the grass. Be careful with the last one as the grass can be slippery and we almost got stuck. Amazing spot if you dont mind a little sun and exposure. We also saw what looked like bear droppings so make noise if you go out S

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Large car park near the shops and the center. Possibilities to spend the night. Very quiet from 7 p.m. The parking lot is guarded. Laundromat nearby.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: A place for a van or camping car just by the river at the exit of the gorges. The place is very beautiful but littered with garbage like everywhere. Easy access stone path

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: A local person recommended this laundry to us. The only one around  Washing drying ironing. On the other hand they do not speak English well but very friendly and welcoming.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking lot of Jelo Etno Village. We asked at the reception and were allowed to stay for free for one night. No service

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.4)
properties.description: Suitable as a parking space for 1 night near the border. In the middle of the forest the direct road hardly disturbs since there is little traffic. You can just stand and there is 4G internet. Also theoretical starting point for long bike tours and hikes. Unfortunately very littered like the entire Balkans. The exYugoslavs will never understand. Access can be seen via the Ivovik sign. This camp definitely doesnt exist.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Dead end of the old street. The new road runs a little below. The ground is good gravel. Good overnight accommodation at 1100m.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking just off the no mans land road a few flat spaces and the opportunity to follow the gravel track to park further from the road. Slow but clean drinking water available just below at the katun blue hose into the bathtubs. 4g internet.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Large grassy flat area on top of a hill overlooking Kosovo. Stunning views and right next to phone tower if you want to stream Netflix once its dark   4x4 recommended but accessible to brave 2wheelers. Follow gravel track from parking lot. Best thing...no trash

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Located between the Montenegrin and Kosovar border crossings this place could be idyllic if it were not littered with rubbish. Shame  Below the road and hidden behind the trees the place is quiet. We left with two bags full of plastic bottles. Let everyone try to do the same

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Great place with great views. Right on a street but there is very little traffic.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Nice place in a culdesac at about 1750m. You have a beautiful view at sunset. You are right next to the street but you cannot be seen because you are behind a wall. The road has very little traffic. However the place is sloping. Blueberries and raspberries grow on the slope below.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Beautiful plateau at 1700m altitude with a magnificent view. windy plateau but you can take shelter in the trees a little higher up.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.25)
properties.description: Nice parking space in front of football field and swimming pool. Parking uses to visit Gostilje waterfall. Water at the end of the football field. Payable to the park guard. Quiet at night

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Ethno Old village Sirogojno The open air museum

properties.name: Picnic area (4)
properties.description: Place with table and parasol we spent 24 hours there ideal for a lunch break or to spend the night. Halfway between the cave and the 19th century village nice and not very expensive Thank you for keeping this place clean no trash can on site take your waste away.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Great spring water. good pressure Looks great the water comes out of a 5m high replica of a bottle. Drinking water.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.4)
properties.description: A little after the monastery and checkpoints KFOR on the right a bridge over the river on the left an electrical installation a little further there is an embankment platform that can act as parking for the night. We tried just before the bridge along the river but were dislodged at 3am by a KFOR patrol. Maybe it is also possible to park in the parking of the monastery but we have not tested because it is in the shade.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Monastery car park we spent the night there because we arrived too late to visit the monument. However we asked permission from the soldiers present on the site who gave us their agreement.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Small almost flat space on the side of the road to spend a night with a Van. land just after the rock.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)
properties.description: Space at the zipline and a restaurant. The owner speaks German and is very friendly. We didnt eat as the restaurant was still closed. We spent a quiet cool night. But it wasnt a season yet.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.91)
properties.description: Good place to stay to visit the city. On a paved road that is not available on OSM or google 2020.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.2)
properties.description: Big guarded parking at the hospital plenty of room and space for campers and caravans. Good location for the city and tours In the area and nice view to the mountains.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Guarded car park paying the day free night from 8pm to 8am

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Nice relatively level place and SH 23. Not much to be found on this road so we were glad to be able to stay here. Totally quiet at night. A few houses in sight.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Beautiful plateau surrounded by nature and overlooking the Fierze reservoir underground grass level terrain

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Beautiful location overlooking the lake. 360 degree views. There is a large gravel layby off the tarmac road with space for 4 campers. Its 50m on the left before the covered entrance to the Hotel  Dukagjini compound. No access to the lake. Peaceful place.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Well with good flow.Parking is available on the other side of the street.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Flow very slow. Ice cold mountain water. Nice view but with enough rubbish

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.2)
properties.description: Free parking next to a restaurant and the river.No servicesFlat cravel. the access  500 m is a little narrow when you meet other cars but ok even for big motorhomes.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.89)
properties.description: Nice place spot on the bank of a river surrounded by trees with a lot of shade. Locals are usually relaxing here. Good 3G signal. Few km up this place is a beautiful monastery. Spring water nearby.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Parking of the hotel Raj we spent the night without problem we advise you not put too close to the hotel because the customers park there and not too far either to capture the wifi in short exactly as in the photo its perfect

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)
properties.description: Quiet place by side of road on the way to the Durdevi Stupa Monastery. We stayed one night. Only space for one van 7m long. Beautiful view over Novi Pazar and surrounding hills. No services. Easy 2 min walk up to the medieval monastery at the top of the hill they have a toilet which is open in daylight hours  in case of emergencies

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Convenient paid parking For visiting Novi pazar near the market and the city center. Barrier to entry often several vehicles are waiting in front but there are still places. Small tap near the river at the entrance and sorting bins on the other side when crossing the road

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Free parking of the restaurant Divan without installation. Level slightly sloping but great views of the city. If you have a drink at the restaurant and ask you can stay for the night in the parking lot and get the code for the wifi.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.4)
properties.description: Secure parking close to city center. During daytime there is a guard till 8 pm. Good to visit the oldtown.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Free parking in the middle of the city. 2 min to the old town in one direction and 2 min to the shopping street in the other direction. Stood here two days and one night and nobody was bothered. No problem with a van even a large mobile home should find space on the right side of the road. Is always quite full during the course of the day but left and came back 3 times and always found a place. Is felt in the wealthy part. A cafe with wifi across the bridge at the end of the street. Great interesting and vibrant city.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Water point with connection tap and easy to reach. High pressure.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: You can find lots of nice spots in the Shkugez park to spend a night under the trees just a few minutes from Gjakova. Its quite busy during the day but very quiet at night. A good choice of restaurants cafes children parks to fill your needs if you stay during the day but we didnt look for electricity or water not sure if you can find.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.19)
properties.description: Parking of the falls of the mirusha. Attention access is done by a dented and muddy track and rainy weather. We went through the end of March.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.75)
properties.description: Flat meadow on a hill. Turn left at the cemetery of SH23 behind this left past the bunker on the hill. No right way but feasible without allwheel drive. According to the traces campfires are made here with old car tires otherwise hardly any garbage.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Nice Spot by the river wich is used for swimming by locals. Unfortunately the river is not very clean but good for refreshing. You can park directly on the grass if your camper is not to low cause there is one part where you risk to touch the bottom. Otherwise theres a huge parking lot next to the restaurant nearby. Sunny or with shade as you wish. On the other side of the bridge there is a nice canyon with many turtles around worth visiting.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Parking next to a UCK memorial obelisk. Nice view flat gravel. Drinking water tap next to the monument.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: In the middle of a giant field. There is a small dirt road you can use to drive as far as you want. Beautiful views and a great stop before going to the waterfalls. Some shepherd boys came in the morning and we tried talking to them.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: After a long search I found a place where I could quickly and easily fill up my Campingaz bottle 2.75L. 2L cost me 400 lek.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Place for one night on the street little traffic.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.86)
properties.description: Beautiful location overlooking the valley for a bivouac in the countryside road leading to good quality with however several passages heavily degraded no water nearby.

properties.name: Free motorhome area (5)
properties.description: Quite place with restaurant near.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.17)
properties.description: Quiet car park on a hilltop in front of a small old cemetery or Memorial. Great panoramic view sunset between the fields. The road is hardly busy at night. Neat 3G reception.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking in the interesting town good for sightseeing. No shade just concrete but is right on the river. We didnt stay overnight. It is right next to a cafe near a water park.
